DataElement.preferredName: Rheumatoid Arthritis Involvement Extent Disease Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A chronic systemic disease, primarily of the joints, marked by inflammatory changes in the synovial membranes and articular structures, widespread fibrinoid degeneration of the collagen fibers in mesenchymal tissues, and by atrophy and rarefaction of bony structures. Etiology is unknown, but autoimmune mechanisms have been implicated._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._the free text field to specify the involvement or extent of disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A chronic systemic disease, primarily of the joints, marked by inflammatory changes in the synovial membranes and articular structures, widespread fibrinoid degeneration of the collagen fibers in mesenchymal tissues, and by atrophy and rarefaction of bony structures. Etiology is unknown, but autoimmune mechanisms have been implicated.

Concepts.definition: A chronic, systemic autoimmune disorder characterized by inflammation in the synovial membranes and articular surfaces. It manifests primarily as a symmetric, erosive polyarthritis that spares the axial skeleton and is typically associated with the presence in the serum of rheumatoid factor.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify the type of rheumatoi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the type of rheumatoid arthritis involvement:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2750529
ReferenceDocuments.description: "PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation [assessment] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode(ANY=>CD).originalText [secondary] = {specified involvement} WHERE  PerformedDiagnosis.value [primary] = ""rheumatoid arthritis"" AND PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode [secondary] = {specified disorder} AND PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > PerformedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value = ""Involvement""  AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > DefinedObservation.nameCode = ""Assess Involvement"""
